member.name: P:Foundatio.Jobs.Commands.JobConfiguration.Types
member.summary: A list of job types to use. If this collection is populated, it will override Assemblies and Exclusions.

member.name: P:Foundatio.Jobs.Commands.JobConfiguration.Assemblies
member.summary: List of assemblies to inspect for types that implement IJob.

member.name: P:Foundatio.Jobs.Commands.JobConfiguration.Exclusions
member.summary: List of exclusion patterns that will be applied to the jobs discovered in the specified assemblies.
